input.sentences: we took a trip to the candy house ! we ate lots of sweet treats !
after a lunch of candy we took a walk by the ocean | where the ponds intertwine before heading to the sea .
there was some cool art along the way | including this pair of bronzed berkinstocks .
we headed to the beach shore gift shop to pick up some trinkets for friends and family .
afterwards we went to diner to eat dinner | but we missed the time ! and ended up having to go elsewhere .
output.sentences: I took a trip to get some sweet treats.
On my trip I took a walk to see the sea and ponds.
I was mom told me including a cool pair of sandals was a good idea.
I bought some trinkets at the shop near the shore.
Time flew by and I almost missed lunch, but luckily, I got something to eat.
